original_text: If you forsake the Lord and serve foreign gods, he will turn and bring disaster on you and make an end of you, after he has been good to you.”
korean_text: 만일 너희가 여호와를 버리고 이방 신들을 섬기면 너희에게 복을 내리신 후에라도 돌이켜 너희에게 재앙을 내리시고 너희를 멸하시리라 하니

sentences.original_text: he will turn and bring disaster on you
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 돌이켜 당신에게 재앙을 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and make an end of you
after he has been good to you
